name: Twilio ArmorVox Connector
description: Twilio ArmorVox Connector provides the WebSocket and API endpoint to service the Enrolment and Verify Flows

ARMORVOX_ENDPOINT.description: This is the endpoint URL provide by ArmorVox

ARMORVOX_GROUP.description: This is the unique group name provide by Auraya ArmorVox.

ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret Access Key required for by Twilio Function to connect to this app.
